means: （由寓言、故事、事件引出的） 道德上的教训( moral的名词复数 )

sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些名词均含"道德"之意。
means: morals ： 多用于实践方面，指按习惯或社会公认的道德标准，尤指男女之间关系的道德。
morality ： 指符合道德标准的行为
，或用道德标准衡量某事，既指社会的又指个人的道德。
ethics ： 多用于伦理方面，指符合于伦理学中所指的好的行为，常指公平正真地对人对事的品德。

sentence.Network_en: This was a matter less of morals than of expediency.
sentence.Network_cn: 此举只是权宜之计，不关乎道德问题。

sentence.Network_en: Lust now seems to be associated with casual sex and loose morals.
sentence.Network_cn: 色欲如今似乎与性生活随便和道德放纵联系在一起了。

PerfectNetExp.abs: 法律与道德(morals) 的关系乃是19 世纪法学家所讨论的三个主要论题之一。耶林(jhering) 把“法律与道德的关系”称之为法理学的合恩 …
He has no morals and will do anything for money ., 他不讲道德 , 为了钱什么都干.
she has no morals ! she's really a whore !她没有道德标准！她真是个水性杨花的女人！
He is a widower with roving eye and the morals of a stray dog ., 他是一个眼睛滴溜溜乱转 , 道德水准和一条野狗差不多的鳏夫.

list.abs: 道德之实落在仁义﹐这才是道德(moral)的真正意义。「道德」这个词在儒家的实义就是仁义。
英语词根6 - Leo.Zhu - 博客园 ... remonstration n 抗议，反对 moral a 道德的 mural a 墙壁的 n.壁画.
求M开头的所有单词！！谁多采纳谁？_爱问知识人 ... monster n.怪物，妖怪 morality n.道德，品行 mourn v．哀悼，哀伤.
大学英语精读单词表(第三册) - 豆丁网 ... doorway n. 门口； 门道 morally ad. 道德上 moral a. 道德上的.
生产管理 - MBA智库百科 ... (5)安全( S：Safety) (6)士气( M：Morale) (1)效率( P：Productivity).

entry.def: Morals are principles and beliefs concerning right and wrong behaviour.

example.tran: 西方的思想和道德规范

entry.def: Moral means relating to beliefs about what is right or wrong.

example.ex: She describes her own moral dilemma in making the film.
example.tran: 她讲述了拍摄这部电影过程中她在道义上所面临的两难选择。

example.ex: ...matters of church doctrine and moral teaching.
example.tran: 教会教义和道德教化的事情

entry.tran: （勇气或职责）道义上的;基于道德规范的
entry.def: Moral courage or duty is based on what you believe is right or acceptable, rather than on what the law says should be done.

example.ex: The Government had a moral, if not a legal duty to pay compensation.
example.tran: 政府即使没有法律责任，在道义上也有责任来赔偿。

example.ex: ...his moral courage and sane defence of his philosophy.
example.tran: 他的道德勇气和对自己观点明智的辩护

entry.def: A moral person behaves in a way that is believed by most people to be good and right.

example.ex: The people who will be on the  committee are moral, cultured, competent people.
example.tran: 进入委员会的人要品行端正，有文化，有能力。

entry.def: If you give someone moral support, you encourage them in what they are doing by expressing approval.

example.ex: Moral as well as financial support was what the West should provide.
example.tran: 西方国家应该提供道义支持和经济援助。

entry.tran: (由故事、事件引出的)道德训诫，寓意
entry.def: The moral of a story or event is what you learn from it about how you should or should not behave.

example.ex: I think the moral of the story is let the buyer beware...
example.tran: 我想这个故事的寓意是提醒购物者当心。

example.ex: The moral is that, once cooked, they look the same and taste every bit as good.
example.tran: 由此可知，烹饪后，它们的味道和品相都别无二致。

means.word_mean: 1. motivation based on ideas of right and wrong

auth_sentence.content: Making money makes people forget their morals!!!
auth_sentence.res_content: Making money makes people forget their morals!!!
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Making money makes people forget their morals!!!

auth_sentence.content: There is an intimate interdependence of intellect and morals.
auth_sentence.res_content: There is an intimate interdependence of intellect and morals.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: There is an intimate interdependence of intellect and morals.

auth_sentence.content: Charles II came back...with tastes as corrupt as his morals.
auth_sentence.res_content: Charles II came back...with tastes as corrupt as his morals.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Charles II came back...with tastes as corrupt as his morals.
